# Toolisk

> Free, high-performance online tools for daily use — fast, private, and feature-rich. All computation happens client-side in the browser; no data is ever sent to a server.

Toolisk is a collection of financial calculators and utilities built for accuracy and speed. Tools are free, require no sign-up, and work entirely in your browser.

## Finance Calculators

- [EMI Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/emi-calculator): Calculate monthly loan repayments for home loans, car loans, and personal loans. Includes prepayment simulation, amortization schedule, and Reduce EMI vs Reduce Tenure comparison.
- [SIP Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/sip-calculator): Calculate Systematic Investment Plan returns with step-up SIP options. Visualise wealth accumulation and plan goal-based investments.
- [Compound Interest Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/compound-interest-calculator): Calculate compound interest for lump-sum investments across daily, monthly, and annual compounding frequencies.
- [FIRE Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/fire-calculator): Calculate the corpus needed for Financial Independence Retire Early. Supports Lean FIRE, Fat FIRE, Coast FIRE, and Barista FIRE strategies.
- [Income Tax Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/income-tax-calculator): Compare Old vs New tax regime for Indian taxpayers (FY 2025-26). Calculates tax liability, rebates, and deduction optimisation under Sections 80C, HRA, 80D, and more.
- [Mortgage Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/mortgage-calculator): Calculate home loan EMI and total housing cost including property tax, insurance, and maintenance.
- [Amortization Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/amortization-calculator): Generate month-by-month amortization schedules showing principal vs interest breakdown for any loan.
- [Buy vs Rent Calculator](https://toolisk.com/finance/buy-vs-rent-calculator): Compare buying vs renting with full cost analysis including opportunity cost, hidden ownership expenses, and long-term wealth accumulation.
